column4: I have a nvidia card, but the instructions at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/Nvidia are for the graphical UI..  I'm running Ubuntu server, and I just need a basic terminal window (I'm eventually going to unplug the machine and put it in a closet).
Except that the last two lines of my terminal is cut off
and I'm ppretty sure it's not the screen
That doesn't have nothing to do with X and its nVidia module...
